items.title: Hegseth and Trump reiterate 'warrior' ethos in remarks to top US generals
items.description: The defence secretary outlined his vision for the Pentagon, which includes implementing “high and gender-neutral” physical fitness standards.

items.title: Watch: What do Gazans and Israelis think of Trump's plan?
items.description: People in Gaza and Jerusalem share their reactions to the US president's new strategy for ending the war.

items.title: Flights in Afghanistan grounded after internet shutdown
items.description: The Taliban have yet to give an official reason for the shutdown, but said it would last indefinitely.

items.title: Chinese woman convicted after 'world's biggest' bitcoin seizure
items.description: UK police seized crypto worth over £5bn from Zhimin Qian, who was known as 'the goddess of wealth'.

items.title: For Netanyahu, avoiding a peace deal may now be worse than agreeing one
items.description: Trump is asking the Israeli PM to risk his government but dangling the prospect of a historic legacy, writes Lucy Williamson.
